name: Unity2D Mobile Dodge Game Asset Pack
name_original: Unity2D Mobile Dodge Game Asset Pack
description:
Here is a pack for you! Easily start making your own mobile dodging game with:

  • High scores
  • Skin selection
  • Save system (for high score)
  • UI (Main menu, lose menu, in-game score)
  • Simple code
  • Easily customizable

The UI is inconsistent so that I am allowed to sell the asset without using external assets, so as soon as you get this I suggest getting a free pixel font!
